title: The Cell
creator_credit: British Broadcasting Corporation and Jim Stephenson
brief_description: Shows chemical events which take place within the living cell. Presents the various protein functions, including D.N.A. and genetic coding, discusses mitochondrian and chloroplasts, and investigates cellular communication.
